overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains a robust social media presence across multiple platforms, including Mastodon, LinkedIn, and Bluesky. With a combined total of 3,580 followers, his posts frequently spark engagement, particularly on topics related to computational social science, disinformation, and social media analysis. LinkedIn emerges as the most engaging platform, with posts there receiving the highest number of likes and comments.
